verses.text: When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, and hath cast \w out|strong="H5394"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Girgashites|strong="H1622"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w greater|strong="H7227"\w* and \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* than thou;

And when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; thou shalt \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* them, \add and\add* \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* them; thou shalt \w make|strong="H3772"\w* no \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them, nor shew \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* unto them:

Neither shalt thou make \w marriages|strong="H2859"\w* with them; thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* thou shalt not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, nor his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* unto thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

For they will turn \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* me, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: so will the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against you, and \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* thee \w suddenly|strong="H4118"\w*.

But thus shall ye \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with them; ye shall \w destroy|strong="H5422"\w* their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and break \w down|strong="H7665"\w* their \w images|strong="H4676"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w* their \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* their graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft their images: Heb. their statues, or, pillars\f*

For thou \add art\add* an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* thee to be a \w special|strong="H5459"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto himself, above all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* did not set his \w love|strong="H2836"\w* upon you, nor \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* you, because ye were \w more|strong="H7230"\w* in number than any \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; for ye \add were\add* the \w fewest|strong="H4592"\w* of all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

But because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w loved|strong="H0160"\w* you, and because he would \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* which he had \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* you out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*, from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Know|strong="H3045"\w* therefore that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, which \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* with them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* to a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*;

And \w repayeth|strong="H7999"\w* them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* him to their \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* them: he will not be \w slack|strong="H0309"\w* to him that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* him, he will \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* him to his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

Thou shalt therefore \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them.

¶ Wherefore it shall come to pass, \w if|strong="H6118"\w* ye \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to these \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* unto thee the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and the \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*:\f + \fr 7.12 \ft if: Heb. because\f*

And he will \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thee, and \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* thee: he will also \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, thy \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and thine \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, the \w increase|strong="H7698"\w* of thy \w kine|strong="H0504"\w*, and the \w flocks|strong="H6251"\w* of thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

Thou shalt be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* above all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: there shall not be \w male|strong="H6135"\w* or female \w barren|strong="H6135"\w* among you, or among your \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from thee all \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*, and will \w put|strong="H7760"\w* none of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w diseases|strong="H4064"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, which thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*, upon thee; but will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* them upon all \add them\add* that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee.

And thou shalt \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee; thine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall have no \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* upon them: neither shalt thou \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*; for that \add will be\add* a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* unto thee.

If thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, These \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \add are\add* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* than I; \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* I \w dispossess|strong="H3423"\w* them?

Thou shalt not be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of them: \add but\add* shalt \w well|strong="H2142"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* what the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and unto all \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;

The \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w temptations|strong="H4531"\w* which thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, and the \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*, and the \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, and the \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and the stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, whereby the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* brought thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w*: so shall the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of whom thou art \w afraid|strong="H3373"\w*.

Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* the \w hornet|strong="H6880"\w* among them, until they that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, and \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* themselves \w from|strong="H6440"\w* thee, be \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w*.

Thou shalt not be \w affrighted|strong="H6206"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* them: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, a \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will put \w out|strong="H5394"\w* \w those|strong="H0411"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee by \w little|strong="H4592"\w* and \w little|strong="H4592"\w*: thou \w mayest|strong="H3201"\w* not \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* them at \w once|strong="H4118"\w*, lest the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* upon thee.\f + \fr 7.22 \ft put…: Heb. pluck off\f*

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them unto \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, and shall \w destroy|strong="H1949"\w* them with a \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H4103"\w*, until they be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*.\f + \fr 7.23 \ft unto…: Heb. before thy face\f*

And he shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and thou shalt \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* their \w name|strong="H8034"\w* from under \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: there shall no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be able to \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, until thou have \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them.

The graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* of their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* shall ye \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: thou shalt not \w desire|strong="H2530"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* or \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add that is\add* on them, nor \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* unto thee, lest thou be \w snared|strong="H3369"\w* therein: for it \add is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Neither shalt thou \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* into thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, lest thou be a cursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w* like it: \add but\add* thou shalt \w utterly|strong="H8262"\w* \w detest|strong="H8262"\w* it, and thou shalt \w utterly|strong="H8581"\w* \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* it; for it \add is\add* a cursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*.
